General.Name: Zacatecas Silver Corp
General.Description: Zacatecas Silver Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and evaluation of mineral properties in Mexico. The company explores for silver and gold resources. It owns 100% interests in the Zacatecas project that consists of 149 mining concessions covering an area of 7,826.3 hectares located in the Zacatecas State, Mexico; and the Esperanza project that consists of 7 mining concessions covering an area of 4,649 hectares located in the Morelos State, Mexico. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 400-850 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1E1

1.Name: Mr. Jonathan Rene Richards CPA, CA
